allow: Bash(psql lagomorph -c "UPDATE agent_prompts SET system_prompt = ''You are a helpful and friendly web scraping assistant. Help users understand what you can do and answer their questions conversationally. Keep responses concise and clear.'' WHERE agent_name = ''chat_agent'';")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AI-powered web scraping application

Full-stack application built with FastAPI and React that uses Claude AI to
scrape websites and extract company information (names and addresses).

Features:
- FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database
- React frontend with Tailwind CSS
- Chat interface for conversational scraping requests
- Claude AI integration for intelligent data extraction
- Agent prompt editor for real-time system prompt updates
- Database-driven agent configuration
- Streaming responses with Server-Sent Events

Tech stack:
Backend: FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, Anthropic SDK, PostgreSQL
Frontend: React, Vite, TailwindCSS, React Router

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
